title: Fullstack Developer
description: Design, development, and maintenance of comprehensive library management software as a Fullstack Developer.
details: Design, development, and maintenance of comprehensive library management software as a Fullstack Developer
Expertise in developing web applications with modern technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like ReactJs and MUI
Creation of advanced features for managing inventory, sales, transactions, and customer accounts within the library management software
Integration of third-party APIs to connect the library management software with external services, such as book suppliers, payment systems, etc.
Development of an intuitive and responsive user interface to facilitate navigation and enhance user experience
Utilization of relational databases like PostgreSQL to efficiently store essential software information
Implementation of Agile and Scrum methods to improve the efficiency and flexibility of the development process
Participation in code reviews and testing to ensure the quality and stability of the software

title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
description: In-depth study of the state-of-the-art convolutional neural networks (CNNs) applied to audio processing, focusing on different representations such as pulse density modulation and MFCC coefficients.
details: In-depth study of the state-of-the-art convolutional neural networks (CNNs) applied to audio processing, focusing on different representations such as pulse density modulation and MFCC coefficients. This research aimed to understand the advantages and limitations of each approach for the task of keyword-spotting

Design, training, and evaluation of a CNN model specifically dedicated to keyword-spotting using the studied audio representations. The model was implemented using the PyTorch library for its flexibility and GPU computing capabilities
Deployment of the keyword-spotting model on a portable NVIDIA GPU to ensure real-time performance and practical usage in embedded applications

Training the models in a distributed manner using Canada's official national high-performance computing system, 'Calcul Québec,' via an SSH connection. This provided considerable computing power to accelerate model training
Utilization of the Tensorboard framework to visualize the training progress of the models. This approach enabled efficient tracking and analysis of model performance and learning at each stage

Drafting a comprehensive research report as part of a master's project, detailing the methodology, results, and conclusions of the research conducted on convolutional neural networks applied to keyword-spotting

title: Researcher intern
company: CETIAT Laboratory, representative of the French Standard in Europe
description: Design and implementation of a custom test bench, in collaboration with a multidisciplinary team, for the precise and reliable calibration of flow rate sensors
details: Design and implementation of a custom test bench, in collaboration with a multidisciplinary team, for the precise and reliable calibration of flow rate sensors

Development of an ergonomic and intuitive user interface allowing real-time visualization of the test bench sensor data. The interface was developed in Python and C++ to ensure high performance and cross-platform compatibility
Implementation of advanced simulations to analyze and predict the flow evolution within the test bench. These simulations optimized the test bench performance and ensured high measurement accuracy
The solution I implemented became a reference tool within the flowmeter calibration research laboratory and is currently used by France's representative at the European level

As a co-author, I actively participated in writing a high-level scientific article on the design and performance of the flow measurement test bench. This article was published in the prestigious journal 'Flow Measurement & Instrumentation'

I played a central role in project management, coordinating the different stages of design, implementation, and validation of the test bench. This also involved regular communication with internal and external stakeholders
The test bench I designed achieved remarkable results in terms of measurement accuracy and reproducibility, positively impacting the reliability of sensors used in various industrial fields

article.title: Development and validation of a dynamic primary standard for unsteady liquid flow calibration
